title: HoP 317 - Made by Hand - Byzantine Manuscripts
itunes:title: HoP 317 - Made by Hand - Byzantine Manuscripts
description: Without handwritten copies produced by Byzantine scribes, we would know almost nothing about ancient philosophy. How and why were they made?
content:encoded: Without handwritten copies produced by Byzantine scribes, we would know almost nothing about ancient philosophy. How and why were they made?
itunes:subtitle: Without handwritten copies produced by Byzantine scribes, we would know almost nothing about ancient philosophy. How and why were they made?
itunes:summary: Without handwritten copies produced by Byzantine scribes, we would know almost nothing about ancient philosophy. How and why were they made?
itunes:author: Peter Adamson
